entry.title: Markdown速查表:公式输入
entry.content:
既是速查表，常识便不再赘述。

希腊字母

名称大写小写
alphaA\AlphaAα\alphaα
betaB\BetaBβ\betaβ
gammaΓ\GammaΓγ\gammaγ
deltaΔ\DeltaΔδ\deltaδ
epsilonE\EpsilonEϵ\epsilonϵ
zetaZ\ZetaZζ\zetaζ
etaH\EtaHη\etaη
thetaΘ\ThetaΘθ\thetaθ
iotaI\IotaIι\iotaι
kappaK\KappaKκ\kappaκ
lambdaΛ\LambdaΛλ\lambdaλ
muM\MuMμ\muμ
nuN\NuNν\nuν
xiΞ\XiΞξ\xiξ
omicronO\OmicronOο\omicronο
piΠ\PiΠπ\piπ
rhoP\RhoPρ\rhoρ
sigmaΣ\SigmaΣσ\sigmaσ
tauT\TauTτ\tauτ
upsilonΥ\UpsilonΥυ\upsilonυ
phiΦ\PhiΦϕ\phiϕ
chiX\ChiXχ\chiχ
psiΨ\PsiΨψ\psiψ
omegaΩ\OmegaΩω\omegaω

戴帽

符号code
River‾\overline{River}River\overline{}
River‾\underline{River}River​\underline{}
River^\widehat{River}River\widehat{}
River~\widetilde{River}River\widetilde
River→\overrightarrow{River}River\overrightarrow{}
River←\overleftarrow{River}River\overleftarrow{}
River⏞\overbrace{River}River\overbrace{}
River⏟\underbrace{River}River​\underbrace{}
l^\hat{l}l^\hat{}
l~\tilde{l}l~\tilde{}
lˇ\check{l}lˇ\check{}
l˘\breve{l}l˘\breve{}
lˋ\grave{l}lˋ\grave{}
lˊ\acute{l}lˊ\acute{}

​ 戴帽符使用上下标为帽位:

a+b+c⏟1.0+d⏞2.0\overbrace{a + \underbrace{b + c}_{1.0} + d}^{2.0}a+1.0b+c​​+d​2.0​

​ code: \overbrace{a + \underbrace{b + c}_{1.0} + d}^{2.0}

​ 特别的: 极限与求和符号可以后置 \limits 接上下标实现帽位.

括号

​ 使用原始符号也可。

​ 使用 \left 与 \right 前置使符号大小与邻近的公式相适应(此条适用所有的括号类型)。

括号left coderight code
⟨⟩\lang\rang⟨⟩\lang & \langle\rang & \rangle
∣∣\lvert\rvert∣∣\lvert\rvert
∥∥\lVert\rVert∥∥\lVert\rVert
{}\lbrace\rbrace{}\lbrace\rbrace
⌈⌉\lceil\rceil⌈⌉\lceil\rceil
⌊⌋\lfloor\rfloor⌊⌋\lfloor\rfloor

​ 主动增大括号: \big、\Big、\bigg、\Bigg 前置

箭头

符号code符号code符号code
←\leftarrow←\leftarrow⟵\longleftarrow⟵\longleftarrow↑\uparrow↑\uparrow
⇐\Leftarrow⇐\Leftarrow⟸\Longleftarrow⟸\Longleftarrow⇑\Uparrow⇑\Uparrow
→\rightarrow→\rightarrow⟶\longrightarrow⟶\longrightarrow↓\downarrow↓\downarrow
⇒\Rightarrow⇒\Rightarrow⟹\Longrightarrow⟹\Longrightarrow⇓\Downarrow⇓\Downarrow
↔\leftrightarrow↔\leftrightarrow↕\updownarrow↕\updownarrow⇔\Leftrightarrow⇔\Leftrightarrow
⟺\Longleftrightarrow⟺\Longleftrightarrow↦\mapsto↦\mapsto↗\nearrow↗\nearrow
↘\searrow↘\searrow↙\swarrow↙\swarrow↖\nwarrow↖\nwarrow
⇌\rightleftharpoons⇌\rightleftharpoons⇝\leadsto⇝\leadsto↚\nleftarrow↚\nleftarrow
↣\rightarrowtail↣\rightarrowtail↻\circlearrowright↻\circlearrowright⇢\dashrightarrow⇢\dashrightarrow

逻辑

算式code
∵\because∵\because
∴\therefore∴\therefore
∀\forall∀\forall
∃\exist∃\exist
∨\vee∨\vee
∧\wedge∧\wedge
⋁\bigvee⋁\bigvee
⋀\bigwedge⋀\bigwedge

点号

式样code
⋅\cdot⋅\cdot
…\dots…\dots
…\ldots…\ldots
⋯\cdots⋯\cdots
⋮\vdots⋮\vdots
⋱\ddots⋱\ddots

注： \dots 常用于有下标的序列, \cdots 纵向位置较高

空格

式样code距离/em
River ⁣LiuYFRiver\!LiuYFRiverLiuYF{}\!{}−318-\frac{3}{18}−183​
River LiuYFRiver\,LiuYFRiverLiuYF{}\,{}318\frac{3}{18}183​
River LiuYFRiver\:LiuYFRiverLiuYF{}\:{}418\frac{4}{18}184​
River  LiuYFRiver\;LiuYFRiverLiuYF{}\;{}518\frac{5}{18}185​
RiverLiuYFRiver\quad LiuYFRiverLiuYF{}\quad{}111
RiverLiuYFRiver\qquad LiuYFRiverLiuYF{}\qquad{}222

注: 当然还有 \qqquad …

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

More info: Writing
